website_summaries.verdict: Intuitive and effective system that offers customized lawn care advice as well.

customer_reviews.title: So much better
customer_reviews.text: This is so far superior to the manual sprinkler controllers! I could never go back. Just for the simple fact that in order to manually run a zone, I literally scroll down on the home screen and press the play button! Before with the manual controller you had to turn the dial 6 clicks, then press the buttons like 10 times, and then dial 2 more clicks. It was awful!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn S

customer_reviews.title: Easy to operate from my phone
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to install and the app makes it easy to setup special or regular run cycles. It lets me connect to the weather system for watering like “Weather Underground”. In the house I can just tell Alexa to water one or all zones. Alexa can even stop a watering cycle. The setup allows you to setup what type of grass, soil, flowers, sprinkler heads, zone size and more to ensure the right amount of water. Tech support is very good and responsive. The unit requires a WiFi connection and being in the garage it sometimes can not connect and that is my only issue.
customer_reviews.author: savemoney

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install, WiFi configuration, learning curve for app.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Took me about 15 min to install, another 10 to download the app, create an account and get it connected to the WiFi. Stays connected to the WiFi so far. The app takes a little to figure out but I think I got through it. We have watering restrictions and currently only get to water one day a week. March 1st will tell if it is set up correct as we go to 3 times a week for spring. Will report back on it then. Update, still happy with this controler. It changed over to the spring watering schedule I created without a hitch.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting to buy this for a few years and my husband keeps saying no because he didn’t want spend $100. I decided to buy it Regardless of what he said, and I absolutely love it!!! This has made my life so much easier!! It is the best thing ever, even my husband is thrilled with it and is wondering why we didn’t get one sooner. Of course, I haven’t given him access to control it, so he has no opinion as to how it works since technology isn’t his strong suit, but I absolutely love the ease of use. It was super easy to set up and program!
customer_reviews.author: Sionainn Karlssen

customer_reviews.title: Great Smart Sprinkler Controller
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to replace digital Toro controller. I will say this is a very cool intuitive smart controller. Setup was easy and average Joe can do it easily. Just follow directions, take photos of your wiring and follow on screen setup. The best feature I like is how it links with the local weather to not over feed your lawn and does not require rain sensor. This smart controller is worth every cent you send. I highly recommend this product. UPDATE: 5/12/2019 - after using for the first entire season, this is still by far a 5 Star review. Couldn't ask for a good price and quality product with simplistic program features, hands down worth the purchase. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Wifi issue, does not accept apostrophe in your wifi's name
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product since august last year and well ... yes easy to install physically. but on the app its a different story. It does not accept Wifi ssid with apostrophe. so you will need to change your ssid for it to work. It is not an option for me. also if you are able to connect it to a wifi, it has a hard time to stay connected. mine keep loosing connection while it is right next to an accept point.
customer_reviews.author: Damien

customer_reviews.title: Great device...worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: Do not often take time to write reviews but felt a need for Netro Smart Sprinkler Controller. I have had it for about two months. It was so easy to install, hooked up to wifi, and alexia picked it right up. The app I had to look through it a little to get a good feel for it. It has saved me lots of water from needless watering. During rainy season my rain device never was smart enough to not run while it is actually raining. So nice to not check daily weather reports and constantly manually adjusting prior device to run or not to run.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great device, but missing something important, for me...
customer_reviews.text: Received the Netro Sprite. Overall, it's a nice device. Installation and setup were easy. HOWEVER, there are no notifications, as with other smart timers. For me, this is a huge disappointment andI will be returning this unit. If that is not important to you, this is a great unit. The water restrictions for my area were not available. A quick note to support and they entered the info quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Baydrive

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: Netro is a huge improvement over our old system. I am super impressed with the device, the app, and the ease of use. I am now considering the "whisperer" devices that communicate with the Netro controller about actual soil moisture levels. I am so impressed that the Netro connected with my city's watering restrictions, however, the restrictions are reduced, since I now have a smart controller!
customer_reviews.author: H. Sang

customer_reviews.title: Very happy so far
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to control my sprinklers from my phone, so much better than the previous controller I had which is totally unintuitive and lacked remote control functionality. Great price on the this system too, less than some ancient controllers cost. Note that it *does* require power (not just batteries like old controllers), and also you need to have 24v AC solenoids (I had DC 9v ones in my system and it would turn on for a second then stop, but they were dead simple to replace just screw them in.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and set up for wireless.
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this the easiest install for such an important role in for my garden, but it is wonderfully reliable. I can set up a schedule and if it rains while I am at work, I can turn if off remotely. This management console is sleek, brilliant, and smart. Ironically, I called a local sprinkler repair at the same time. He wanted to sell me a 16-zone unit for my small property for $300 and if I wanted the unit with "wireless remote" that would have been another $100 for that rainbird unit. I did this myself in a matter of minutes and at much less cost. I've used it a month now.
customer_reviews.author: Corky

customer_reviews.title: Connecting to the network can take some time.  & wire inputs for each zone are small
customer_reviews.text: I had to try a few times to connect to my home network using my cell phone. So just have a little patience and know that it is your cell phone that finds the netro and connects it to your home network. And the wire inputs for each zone are really small so you may have to cut down the number of wires going into the netro wire connectors. Once connected, I just let it do its thing, and it does it wonderfully! So the whole system works great. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: johnd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Very easy to install (I did it ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Very easy to install (I did it myself). In our region, we are required to have service technician start up and conduct backflow test (which he did). He was impressed with the app and how well it worked. I'm waiting on the Whisperer availability to have the unit run based on moisture on ground and weather conditions. The Netro system will automatically operate based upon local weather conditions. I'll see how well the unit holds up with time and how accurate it is with weather conditions....
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: No hassle, easy setup, tamper resistant.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty simple to install, take out of box, put on wall, connect wires. Done. No crazy taking things apart, rewiring, nor long programming. App asks you a few questions and it sets watering time, days, length based on your answers and weather conditions. Looks cool too :) No more grandchildren playing with the sprinkler controls either, no buttons at all!
customer_reviews.author: TPS777

customer_reviews.title: Good right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to update the old sprinkler system control box that I had, and I am more than happy with his product when it came in the mail. It was really simple to install giving that you take note of what wires you took off of where. (Take a picture). I used the old power transformer and installed the wires in the new one in under 10 min. The app setup and install only took about 5 min. To be honest it was one of the easiest WiFi enabled installs that I have had. Worked first time and every time since.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Schornack

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install!  Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: I love this controller. Easy to install - just follow the instructions. I then downloaded the app and it connected within seconds. Scheduling the times, dates and zones is easy using the app. Everything is very intuitive. This unit replaces a Hunter controller, which worked fine but was a pain to schedule. I also love the weather/rain feature on the app. It's been raining here in SC for the past week. Sprinklers have not gone on based on the forecast. This controller sure makes things so much easier. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Angie in SC

customer_reviews.title: Top product in the market at a 1/3 of the price
customer_reviews.text: 3 years in and I am still happy with purchase. I usually buy the “Top (price)” end products, since you get what you pay for. Usually. This product breaks that mold. Easy to install and the app has more features than I need. The option make for a slight learning curve, but are more than worth it when you need it. (I just had to do a partial lawn repair and it easily allowed for a custom configuration for just the repair section) The repair made me think of reviewing the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Maani Nwankwo

customer_reviews.title: looking good
customer_reviews.text: it works great and likes the cool design and program features. but it is too expensive. I think it is over priced.
customer_reviews.author: J KIM

customer_reviews.title: Great product; great support
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install and works very well. I didn't trust the "smart" part at first but I noticed that it is accurate in postponing a cycle based on the forecast. I had a couple of small issues and emailed support. I got back excellent advice in a timely manner and fixed the issues. Highly recommended and I am going to buy the 12 zone one for another home.
customer_reviews.author: Tom H.

customer_reviews.title: Very smart unit.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy install. Took a little reading and experimenting to set up watering times since I was used to control the details of that watering. This unit does a lot of the thinking of when and how to water. It has already saved me water/money by skipping a watering when rain was expected the next day. Also great that it knows the local watering restrictions. The Alexa integration is a nice added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Grindborg

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and use
customer_reviews.text: This product was very easy to install and up and running in a matter of minutes. Much more convenient than having to go down in the basement and turn it on or off by my phone if needed. Great app.
customer_reviews.author: Rohin Banerji

customer_reviews.title: Quickly paid for itself
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for 3 months and it has already paid for itself and my grass looks better than before. The install was easy and the setup in the app wasn't too bad. Took 5 mins of playing with the app to figure out how things work and was able to get my 5 zone system with varying types of plants and watering restrictions dialed in, in about an hour. In the end, I'm saving a ton of water and keeping money in my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Problems with the Netro App
customer_reviews.text: Just a follow up on my earlier review regarding scheduling issues with the Netro App. To Netro’s credit, they responded immediately and changed some setting to my Netro cloud account. Everything is working great now. I tested some schedules, and no problems. I appreciate the quick response from Netro!
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS RIDDELS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sprinkler solution
customer_reviews.text: This makes lawn care incredibly easy. Not only does it take care of scheduling itself, it also allows me to troubleshoot my new sprinkler installation without having to walk back and forth to the on/off switch every time. I can just turn on the sprinklers from my phone to make sure everything is working as intended.
customer_reviews.author: R. Mabe

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful sprinkler system
customer_reviews.text: We were replacing an ancient sprinkler system that came with our house when we bought it. This one was actually recommended to us by our son-in-law and it has been everything he said it would be. It did not take my husband very long to install and now he can control it from his phone! It also senses when the ground is wet and won't turn on, which is very important since we live in Oregon. Could not be happier with this sprinkler system!
customer_reviews.author: L. Ogilvie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Irrigation System Timer
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. So easy to program each season in the app. I highly recommend it. the only glitch we had, our fault though, when we were setting it up, we did not connect initially to Netro wi-fi. But after that, easy, easy, easy!! We have had to call customer service for anything, so i can't say about their service.
customer_reviews.author: Ketaki Patel

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best smart device I have in my house.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I hate wasting water watering when it's raining. My city has a $50 rebate so this item was really affordable. Install was ok, although I did have one of the power wire connectors break off in the unit which required some ingenuity in installing and using the old wire from my previous unit. Once it was installed, it took 10 minutes to add a few pieces of info and that was it! All the watering schedules were automatically programmed which is probably the best part about this. I'd absolutely buy again, and install a little more carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Kobneck

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy install and awesome support
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking around for a smart irrigation control and netro caught my eye, installation and setup was a breeze and so far it's been working great. I will monitor how the smart watering goes over time and update this review. It pulled in the local restrictions and auto scheduled around the restrictions.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use with one minor flaw
customer_reviews.text: Woah this is great. The app is easy to use and the hardware was even easier to install the only law I can think of is that the hardware itself has nothing on it and you need to do everything on the app. It also has an annoying white light that you cannot turn off.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great product, good value
customer_reviews.text: Great product, good value. It has been working great so far, easy to program. I'm not sure of the "auto" mode as it kept saying the soil had 100% moisture (most of the time) even though it had not rained in my yard. So I turned that off and irrigate on odd days. Since we irrigate from our pond anytime is good.
customer_reviews.author: Meadow01

customer_reviews.title: Good Product and Good Support
customer_reviews.text: This was much easier to install than I thought it would be, even connecting to the wifi was easy. I had a little problem figuring out the watering programing, so I sent an Email to their support. They got back to me the same day with step by step instructions, which solved my problem. The unit has been up and running now and working as advertised, and the app that goes with it makes using the system a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: TerryTRR

customer_reviews.title: Wow, so simple and amazing app!
customer_reviews.text: Installation was a snap. I replaced my old controller in just a few minutes. After getting the app installed and configured, I tested all the zones to make sure they worked, and I haven't touched it since. The app has done an incredible job of using local weather data to decide when and how long to water my lawn. My lawn is looking great! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Professional Zombie

customer_reviews.title: As a smart controller it's excellent as a part of an automated system it has serious deficiencies.
customer_reviews.text: As a smart controller it's excellent as a part of an automated system it has serious deficiencies. For Google home you have to query the Netro Sprite assistant and then what commands are available there are not intuitive and extremely limited.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Ireland

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Great, I love it. Not sure I believe the “savings” they report but hey, not watering if it rains must save some money right? I have found I need to water maybe 10% more than the auto program but I’m ok with that. Being able to check in remotely is handy too.
customer_reviews.author: Tim G. Corcoran

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: What a treat! We had been used to another product that had a life span of 5 years, then something in the box would go wrong. I decide to stop playing that game and went looking for something WiFi. It cost less, was easy to install. Now i can sit in my livingroom to program or check to see when it watered last or when it is going to water next. This is great, just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda D.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing watering system.
customer_reviews.text: I have had a lawn in over 30 years. The old rainbird controller on our new house was over 23 years old and difficult to program. I purchased the Netro system and it was pretty simple even for me at 65 years old. You do need a good wifi system to make it run properly. I had a few questions and was promptly helped by an actual person who really knew their stuff. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Love this product I Love this company
customer_reviews.text: This works as advertised giving me complete control over my irrigation. When it rains The system knows and doesn't turn on. Had to contact Tech support after I changed my router, system did not see new network, was sent a new unit immediately and was up and running again. Only negative I have is limited availability of the tech staff. I will be ordering a faucet unit for my wife's gardening needs next season.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Porter

customer_reviews.title: App is really nice
customer_reviews.text: Finally got around to getting this installed. App is really nice and clean/professional looking. I emailed them about a software bug and they replied back with 24hours about it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.mr

customer_reviews.title: Major flaws.
customer_reviews.text: The wiring connection uses low quality spring loaded contacts instead of screw terminals and they run the controls through the internet so it doesn’t work when there is any kind of network problem.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: easy to install and use
customer_reviews.text: very easy to set up, took maybe 10 minutes from the time I opened the box. once installed, very easy to mange zones. I have not fully taken advantage of all the tools available within the app but look forward to taking full advantage
customer_reviews.author: MAC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome controller!
customer_reviews.text: The smart controller works great. It rained for a week and the controller didn't water the grass. When it stopped raining the irrigation restarted. Once I satisfied the app with my grass type and irrigation everything was automated. You can make your own schedule but I went with the fully automated schedule. The controller also knows your city's irrigation restrictions. Awesome controller.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen B.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this controller. It’s worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Works flawlessly out of the box. Easy setup. Don’t have to program when to water. Does everything automatically with weather info from internet and user inputs like sprinkler heads and soil types and plant or grass type in each zone. Amazing leading edge product
customer_reviews.author: Maile M.

customer_reviews.title: easy to install and keep lawn irrigated
customer_reviews.text: Very fast at setting up and has alot of features that can easily be adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Saves money and water! I love my netro!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! This new controller has saved me nearly $120 on my water bill in one month! My last conventional irrigation controller had a mind of its own, turning on at random times and once even had a single station run for 6 hours! I knew it was time to replace when this happened and my water bill jumped to $300 that month! Netro is making up for the cost and then some! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Don’t know how it works but it does!
customer_reviews.text: Installed easy. Took a while to program, finally deleted all my manual settings and set it to smart settings and my grass is green. Neighbors are doing it 2 and 3 times a day, me once. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: K. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great WiFi Controller
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. I replaced a hunter controller with 4 zones with this 6 zone controller. Installation was a breeze. Wifi setup with the app was also no problem. So far I have labeled my zones and tested them. All good. Since it is raining for the next few days I will wait to program the schedules. So far, well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy N Trammell

customer_reviews.title: Replaced a Blossom system with this. Very glad I did.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sprinkler controller. Priced well and more features than it’s competitors, it packs a punch. This is truly a set-and-forget device. It has saved me $100’s on my water bill.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Light

customer_reviews.title: Great Controller
customer_reviews.text: Great little controller. Easy install and does everything for you. Dummy Proof. Takes everything into consideration - weather, time, days, plant type, etc..... all automatic. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: jgkimo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and operate with the app.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my conventional sprinkler controller with this. Very simple and has made my life simpler
customer_reviews.author: Sokrates

customer_reviews.title: Nice product in the end.
customer_reviews.text: The first originally set controller was not impressive. Installed as directed. Defective product. Had issues because all zones would water at the same time. After working with tech support , I received a replacement that works as described. It took the right person to generate the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Timby

customer_reviews.title: I am finding out that they probably will make the system work better. It took me a couple of days to ...
customer_reviews.text: Although the sensors are a separate unit, I am finding out that they probably will make the system work better. It took me a couple of days to figure out that you really need to go through all the menus and setup the ground type, plant type, sprinkler type for it to be effective. Once that's done it's off to the races. I am really glad I went with this product. I hope more people buy into it so the 'cloud' portion stays free.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Denter

customer_reviews.title: Very neat design and functionalities!
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time setting up the WiFi connection at beginning and their support team are very patient and smart. Once the WiFi connected, the App are very neat and easy to use! Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Lee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sprinkler Controller
customer_reviews.text: This controller was easy to install and looks great. It automatically waters the lawn and I never need to worry about it watering at the wrong times as it was easy to put my towns watering restrictions into the app. I would highly recommend this product to anyone looking to upgrade their sprinkler controller.
customer_reviews.author: Pinkus89

customer_reviews.title: Good value, easy install, decent software. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for 6 months now. Quite happy with the purchase and the software. Install was easy. Saved a bunch of money over Rachio entry-level model.
customer_reviews.author: Pingu

customer_reviews.title: Great product/great customer support!
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo much better that the old way of programming a controller. This is the second season I’ve had this system. I love that I can set everything up remotely. I had a question on shut down at the end of the season last year and the speedy reply from customer support was super. Can’t say enough good about this product and support.
customer_reviews.author: Noli Glover

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: The programing was a little confusing at first but got it. Easy to run from a tablet or cell phone
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great until I had an electrical problem and Netro support was great and offered to replace. Great system.
customer_reviews.author: Mike or Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: I love the no worry no hassle nature of this ! Great so far
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I use this at my rental property. I have a more expensive one for my house, but for the $ it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple installation and easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my old hunter control panel with this easy to setup device. So far it seems to run far less than I have run my sprinkler in the past but grass still looks great. Love the ability to connect to Alexa so I don't have to even pull out my phone if I want to override the system and run the sprinklers
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bumgarner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So great that just playing with the app is fun. Great engineering excellent product. Outstanding customer support!!!
customer_reviews.author: SD1960

customer_reviews.title: Great device, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! The UI is very simple via the app. There are few buttons since the app controls everything. This machine make my old water management system look like a cell phone from the 90’s! Great job Netro!!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J. Camacho

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This controller is awesome! Took only a few minutes to connect. Turned it on, told it the type of soul, grass, amount of sun and let it do its thing. This is the best my lawn has looked in years. I find myself constantly looking at the App to see the next time it will water the lawn.
customer_reviews.author: MIchael

customer_reviews.title: Worth the upgrade
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Really happy with how easy it was to exchange and how easy to navigate it is
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Uzzle

customer_reviews.title: Next generation sprinkler controller
customer_reviews.text: Very good price and a breeze to install. Nice not to have to worry about my lawn this summer
customer_reviews.author: A. Coutts

customer_reviews.title: I love the Netro Sprinkler Controller
customer_reviews.text: I really like this system. Not only can you control everything from your phone it does not water if it is raining. It is much easier to adjust sprinklers when I can turn it off and on without having to go back and forth to the controller in the garage. We liked it so much we bought another one.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Sandow

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Nice product does a good job, not difficult to set up
customer_reviews.author: Kopper Eight

customer_reviews.title: Great support!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect works ands excellent support, i live in uruguay and was not active my geo zone but with a mail the team add my contry in 1 day. The support with google home is poor but works. In general is great products and works good!
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian diaz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This makes my life so much easier! It is an automatic sprinkler system.
customer_reviews.author: Ahram Kwon

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and brings sprinkler systems into the 21st century.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use interface
customer_reviews.text: App is easy to understand and easy to use. My recommendation is to make sure your Wi-Fi reaches to the place where the controller will be installed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Burton

customer_reviews.title: WiFi for this Unit is Everything and Connection is Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Product is definitely indoor use only. Pros: Mechanical set-up is easy. I had to adapt an outdoor controller configuration to this indoor version and this product allowed an easy cross-over. Cons: WiFi connection is horrible. It took dozens of repeated attempts to finally connect to WiFi, even with disconnecting the valve leads and placing the unit right next to the WiFi/modem. After I finally got it connected, I had to reboot to make an adjustment, and never got WiFi reconnected.
customer_reviews.author: Lone Wolf

customer_reviews.title: The customer service is great also I spoke with them about having two units and they walked me right through it and it was easy
customer_reviews.text: I have a very old system and I was able to just purchase a pump start relay and wire the netro in. which is very simple by the way and it works awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Robert R Garlick

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Product is great. If you have 6 or fewer zones this thing is awesome, highly recommend. Cut my water bill in half
customer_reviews.author: E.A.G

customer_reviews.title: No programming
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and does a really good job of watering when necessary and not watering when not necessary.
customer_reviews.author: slaw

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, a bit of a learning curve to work the app, but it works great
customer_reviews.author: John Doan

customer_reviews.title: Easy automation
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup and great app. Much better than prior system due to remote functionality. Love the auto watering scheduling.
customer_reviews.author: Walter J. Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Love this product.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install and works great. It’s a set it and forget it product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hutto

customer_reviews.title: I now own tow of these and I really like how easy it was to set it up and ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews but I feel I must here. I now own tow of these and I really like how easy it was to set it up and how reliable it has been. I few questions that i did have got answered very quickly by the excellent support team Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Vitaliy

customer_reviews.title: Full capability irrigation controller
customer_reviews.text: Great product with lots of functionality, and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kiriakos Sarris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and very easy to setup out of the box. Replaced a very old Rainbird unit with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Open

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It accounts for temperatue, wind, etc. and determines the best times to water. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Bueno

customer_reviews.title: The best bang for a buck,period.
customer_reviews.text: Really intuitive controller that takes the guess work out and is super easy to install.Not to mention the sensor add on that helps it decide when to water even more accurate.
customer_reviews.author: tyrone moore

customer_reviews.title: Check inter and et before installing
customer_reviews.text: It did not recognize my internet even when I set it next to FIOS router. Waste of my time
customer_reviews.author: bridgebuilder

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install, it took me about 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: ken hanson

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and customer service. System was very easy to install and app was quick and easy to install!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Easy install. So far so good. Time will tell. If all my plants die I will revise the review
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore John Tromello

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I had it installed yesterday and it's working great. I love it that it's easy to install and program. Beats paying the more expensive timer that is more popular for almost double the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to install to replace my old sprinkler controller. The app is amazing with smart setup.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Cho

customer_reviews.title: Great value, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Simplicity at its best. Device installation took less than 15 minutes, 5 more for irrigation setup, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Shiriberry

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great app!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install, great app, saves hundreds of dollars by using this product
customer_reviews.author: Jwalker

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup
customer_reviews.text: . Easy to install and setup. App makes it easy to setup a schedule or turn on zones manually.
customer_reviews.author: Emanuel

customer_reviews.title: Good hardware, abysmal software.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like it more ... but the app is terribly buggy on Android. I couldn't complete setup until I moved to an old iPad I had kick around, and now that I have it working, it crashes all the time with Chinglish messages. ('Big problem with app', or something along these lines). And when I try to save the fact that my garden isn't 1000sq ft, it crashes reliably every time. So it's now set for 23minutes of watering on a 200sq ft plot!
customer_reviews.author: tremendusapps

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's really easy to install in only took me 10 minutes works great with Alexa
customer_reviews.author: Atif Khan

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly at all!
customer_reviews.text: Seemed easy to install, but not so easy to program. I’ve done a Rachio and I’d go for that any day over this! Installed at a rental property. Support was not user friendly (non-English speaker) and weird, abnormal WiFi connect. I will try to speak with someone again tomorrow to relearn programming to train tenants. Too odd. Next time I will pay extra for the Rachio system!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer care
customer_reviews.text: I’m very impressed with Netro. I had issues with my initial device but they promptly sent me a new one and made sure my time and efforts put into the faulty device were made up for. I’m confident in working with them now and am very happy
customer_reviews.author: michael giardina

customer_reviews.title: The best system i ever had.  Don’t even look anywhere else. It’s awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace my old clock control board and it’s probably the best thing i did for myself and my lawn. Easy to install and set up. Had it wired and running in under 5 minutes. Works amazingly. Easy to understand controls. Works every time. No more running in and out of the house to run the system test or make adjustments. All at your fingertips. The smart system works flawlessly. Saving you money buy not watering when it rains without you having to do anything. Terrific product can’t praise it enough. worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Sanman66

customer_reviews.title: Incredible sprinkler control!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! Forget HIVE or Rainbird.....for the money it was easy and works amazingly. Only complaint would be that it "overestimates" potential rain for my zipcode since I live in Florida and it could rain across the street and not on my side LOL.....NOT the Netro's fault. You can't go wrong with this as a simple easily installed replacement for your old clunker meter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really like this
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this device but I wish I knew how to set up programs to use on the fly.
customer_reviews.author: Huskernut

customer_reviews.title: Died in 14 months  Only 90 Day Warranty
customer_reviews.text: Tech support was good one time then no longer answered emails Only lasted 14 months and died. The 90 day warranty is a good indication of product quality. Weather feature never worked. Came on during raining days
customer_reviews.author: jwolt

product_meta.title: Netro Smart Sprinkler Controller, WiFi, Weather aware, Remote access, 6 Zone, Compatible with Alexa
feature_bullets: Fully Automatic - EPA WaterSense certified, dynamically creates and adjusts watering schedules optimized for your plants/lawns
Lifetime Cloud Service - Connects to WiFi(2.4G), monitors and controls your sprinkler system anywhere from iOS(8.3+), Android(5.0+) devices and Web browsers
Eco Friendly - Save up to 50% of your outdoor water use with advanced water saving technologies including weather forecasting and historical statistics
Water Restriction - Alerts and auto complies to the watering rules in your local area
Easy Installation - Installs or replaces in around 15 minutes with basic tools. No professionals required. Indoor use only

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars268 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
